Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 65th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2008...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Pittsburgh on 7/31/2008 (Going to TB: RF G. Gross, P M. Lowe. Going to PIT: P J. Fulchino, SS B. Crawford)...
Had first career hit on 8/20/2016, off Dustin Nippert (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/24/2016, off Wade Davis (SDN)...
Released by Pittsburgh on 7/7/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 9/14/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Injured on 5/2/2018 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Houston on 6/30/2019 (Going to HOU: C C. Santana, 2B B. Crawford, P L. Rojas, P B. Smith. Going to LAA: 1B R. Gonzales)...
